member.summary: The keys from both parties must be the same size to generate a secret agreement.

member.summary: The message exceeds the maximum allowable length for the chosen options ({0}).

member.summary: The hash algorithm name cannot be null or empty.

member.summary: ASN1 corrupted data.

member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; P, Q, G and Y are all required.

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_MismatchedPGY
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; P, G and Y must be the same length (the key size).

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_MismatchedQX
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; Q and X (if present) must be the same length.

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_MismatchedPJ
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; J (if present) must be shorter than P.

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_SeedRestriction_ShortKey
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; Seed, if present, must be 20 bytes long for keys shorter than 1024 bits.

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_QRestriction_ShortKey
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; Q must be 20 bytes long for keys shorter than 1024 bits.

member.name: P:System.SR.Cryptography_InvalidDsaParameters_QRestriction_LargeKey
member.summary: The specified DSA parameters are not valid; Q's length must be one of 20, 32 or 64 bytes.

member.summary: Specified key is not a valid size for this algorithm.

member.summary: The TLS key derivation function requires a seed value of exactly 64 bytes.
